It is considered fully ready for testing on both VRSCTEST testnet and VRSC mainnet. While this release is likely to work fine on mainnet through the coming activation, it is not yet an official release that you should expect to support mainnet activation. If you install this version, please make sure to upgrade to an official release before network activation, which will happen at block 800200, expected to be mined or staked on December 15th. What are some possible false positive warnings that I might see when installing the software?

Some antivirus software, such as Avast and Kaspersky, may flag the software as "not-a-virus" or "PUP" (potentially unwanted program). This is because the software includes mining capabilities, which could potentially be installed by a third party to exploit your PC.
